titleStmt.title: The life of the Right Reverend Father in God, Seth, Lord Bishop of Salisbury and chancellor of the most noble Order of the Garter with a brief account of Bishop Wilkins, Mr. Lawrence Rooke, Dr. Isaac Barrow, Dr. Turbervile, and others / written by Dr. Walter Pope ...
titleStmt.author: Pope, Walter, d. 1714.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary, New York.
